import{useSelector}from'react-redux';// Voting
export const useGetProposals=()=>{const proposals=useSelector(state=>state.voting.proposals);return Object.values(proposals);};export const useGetProposal=proposalId=>{const proposal=useSelector(state=>state.voting.proposals[proposalId]);return proposal;};export const useGetVotes=proposalId=>{const votes=useSelector(state=>state.voting.votes[proposalId]);return votes?votes.filter(vote=>vote._inValid!==true):[];};export const useGetVotingStateLoadingStatus=()=>{const votingStatus=useSelector(state=>state.voting.voteLoadingStatus);return votingStatus;};export const useGetProposalLoadingStatus=()=>{const votingStatus=useSelector(state=>state.voting.proposalLoadingStatus);return votingStatus;};
